summary: This bill, the Creating Opportunities to Thrive and Advance Act (COTA Act), aims to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act. It focuses on increasing public awareness of skilled trade programs. The bill specifically mandates providing guidance on career options in high-skill, high-wage, and in-demand industries, including skilled trades. It also requires public service announcements and social media campaigns to promote career and technical education programs and community-based organizations that prepare students for these professions.
